name: Holdsworth Associates
overview:
Holdsworth Associates is a Cambridge-based PR consultancy that creates innovative, cost-effective campaigns that achieve results. We support a broad range of organisations and have a special knowledge of science and technology.

Holdsworth Associates works in partnership with clients, looking at their whole business, creating communications strategies that are appropriate for their needs, and supporting and promoting the long-term development of their organisations.

Early-stage and established businesses can have very different objectives, and Holdsworth Associates works in partnership with clients to create effective communications strategies within their budgets. Implementation of this strategy may include media relations, ePR (including social media), website development, focus groups, brochures and reports, and events and launches.
